author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #899.
* update_editor.c (add_or_open_file):  don't add a new file if a
scheduled-add entry already exists.

author: dlr
msg: * Makefile.in, subversion/bindings/swig/python/setup.py:
A fix by Brandon Ehle for the out-of-directory compile problem
with the swig python bindings reported by Jon Middleton.

author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #714.  If 'svn revert' attempts to revert a missing
directory, then send a new "failed revert" notification to the client.
Our commandline client interprets this signal by recommending an update.
[Note that someday, 'svn revert --force' will actually cause a network
fetch of a missing directory.  See issue #1040.]
* svn_wc.h (svn_wc_notify_action_t): new svn_wc_notify_failed_revert.
* feedback.c (notify):  recommend updating when reversion fails.
* adm_ops.c (revert_admin_things): fix  docstring.
(svn_wc_revert):  inspired by the patch from Benjamin Pflugmann
<benjamin-svn-cvs@pflugmann.de>, send a failed-revert notification
if attempting to revert a missing directory.

author: blair
msg: Set up the structure so that LDFLAGS can be passed down to swig and
python's setup.py so it can be passed to the linking of the actualy
swig bindings.  This enables the generated Swig bindings to find the
shared libraries at run time if the user sets LDFLAGS.  Patch started
by Brandon Ehle.
* subversion/bindings/swig/python/setup.py:
New command line options, -C for passing options to the compiler at
compile time and -R for passing options to the compiler at link
time.  These are passed down via the extra_compile_args and
extra_link_args values.
* ac-helpers/swig.m4
(SVN_FIND_SWIG): Take LDFLAGS and SWIG_LDFLAGS and put them into a
new variable SWIG_PY_SETUP_LDFLAGS which can be passed to setup.py.
All -L options in LDFLAGS and SWIG_LDFLAGS are passed through
unchanged and all others have an additional command line option -R
prepended.
* Makefile.in:
Use $(SWIG_PY_SETUP_LDFLAGS) from ac-helpers/swig.m4 instead of
$(SWIG_LDFLAGS) for passing arguments to setup.py in swig-py-ext and
install-swig-py-ext.

author: cmpilato
msg: reset to unix line endings
